definition: to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Some 28 percent of adolescents say they are too tired to exercise, due to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 28%的年轻人表示，由于睡眠不足而没劲儿运动。

sentences.english: He came to welcome me with a handshake.
sentences.chinese: 他来与我握手表示欢迎。

sentences.english: According to Zhao, life in military campsites is not monotonous.
sentences.chinese: 赵峰表示，军营生活并不单调。

sentences.english: The screen capture shows on the right an example of a task presentation.
sentences.chinese: 截图的右面显示了一个任务表示的示例。

sentences.english: The Grain Budding shows that crops that will ripen in summer start to show plump seeds.
sentences.chinese: 小满表示在夏季成熟的农作物籽粒开始饱满了。

sentences.english: The last chapter gives an indication of the state-of-the-art in an industrial environment.
sentences.chinese: 最后一章在一种工业环境里表示最新型。

sentences.english: I should like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your gracious receptionhospitality.
sentences.chinese: 我愿向你们盛情的接待与款待表示衷心的感谢。

sentences.english: The encoding rules are very flexible and support the representation of data graphs and polymorphism.
sentences.chinese: 编码规则非常灵活并支持图形数据和多态的表示。

sentences.english: He was sure, he said diplomatically, that the government would do all it could.
sentences.chinese: 梁先生曾婉转表示，他确信政府已经尽力。

sentences.english: Boeing says it found problems in the process used to reach the decision.
sentences.chinese: 波音公司表示他在过去做出决定的过程中发现了问题。

sentences.english: He said to further enhance friendship, deepen understanding, deepen bilateral cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 他表示要进一步增进友谊，加深理解，深化双方合作。

sentences.english: The length of the bar stands for quantity.
sentences.chinese: 用直条的高矮来表示数量的多少。

sentences.english: The ampersand (&) characters between the sibling element subpatterns indicate that any order is acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 兄弟元素子范式之间的竖线表示允许任何顺序。

sentences.english: His coach Sun Haiping said he was worried about the great pressure on Liu Xiang at this time.
sentences.chinese: 教练孙海平对刘翔此次所承受的压力表示担心。

sentences.english: They also welcomed the decision to cancel the run-off election.
sentences.chinese: 他们也对阿富汗取消决选表示欢迎。

sentences.english: He later said he had a liver transplant during this period.
sentences.chinese: 他稍后表示在病休期间接受了一次肝移植手术。

definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to declare one's position/to say where one stands
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
